title: Yoru no Yomeiri
sinopse:
In the summer her grandfather passed away, high school girl Yoru found herself abandoned. To protect her home, she decides to marry a certain man...!!

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

Included one-shot:
Volume 1: Watashitachi wa Hentai wo Katteiru. (Crossover one-shot with Watashi wa Tensai wo Katteiru.)
